column4: 64bit Lucid: I've got the 10.1 32bit flash installed using ndiswrapper from a tutorial found in the forums but full-screen video looks very choppy with it. Any suggestions? Trying to stream world cup games smoothly :)
is your internet fast enoough to streap high quality video in the first place? You might want to check that first
Yes, in Windows it looks perfect on the same computer.
maybe giving it a higer priority would help. I cant remember how to do it though
